original_text: When that happens, you will have no food, because your enemy's soldiers are all around your town. You will be so hungry that you eat your own children. Those are the sons and daughters that the Lord your God has given to you.
korean_text: 네가 적군에게 에워싸이고 맹렬한 공격을 받아 곤란을 당하므로 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주신 자녀 곧 네 몸의 소생의 살을 먹을 것이라

sentences.original_text: because your enemy's soldiers are all around your town
sentences.korean_translation: 네 원수의 군사들이 네 마을 주위에 모두 있기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: that you eat your own children
Those are the sons and daughters
that the Lord your God has given to you
